title: Beyond the Veil of Illusion: The Awakening
description: Adult metaphysical spiritual romance and mystery set in the magical southwest, the Awakening introduces the reader to spiritual awakenings, tantric romance, sexy higher vibrational spiritualists, true soulmate connections and supernatural events. Follow Mia after the end of a relationship to Sedona, AZ where she moves to reconnect to her spiritual roots. It would prove to be a journey of spiritual growth and awakenings, helping her rediscover herself, her strength and a love that transcended space and time, as she traveled beyond the veil of illusion.
author: Leeza Donatella
